review_text: We loved our stay in this apartment, it was so cute and comfortable. There are several places close by to eat and shop. The apartment is so very unique and homey feeling! There are plants and books, and the decor keeps you looking. We did not really cook while we were there, but everything was available for us to do so. There were plenty of linens, blankets, toiletries, and even a small washer and dryer. It is on the main street so you will hear some traffic, but the neighbors were very quiet. We were also able to bring our little dog. There are patches of grass to take your pet to get some exercise also. The best place we found is a block away, at Memorial Auditorium. There is grass and a picnic table and they even provide waste bags for your pet. Terri sent us a picture that made it easy to identify the apartment entrance. We received a code to get into the building, then a key to the apartment. We would definitely recommend this to anyone staying in Pittsburg!
